"To barbarians and propagators of hate, we must respond firmly, the strength of our laws and the rigors of our rule of law"
Vows in Liège: "I want to reaffirm our commitment to freedom of expression and our rejection of anti-Semitism" http://t.co/wOrazdMO58
"The PS, with its exceptional history, its experience, its values, is the political party best able to meet the challenges of tomorrow"
We welcome the cease-fire statement from the dawn of Libya and Sunrise. We bless this brave attitude and call on everyone to do the same.
"We must drive a European evolution. The 19 countries that together have the euro should form a stronger Europe "
"A Europe + solidary, + social, + strong, with a harmonized fiscal policy + common social bases"
"We must fight to establish minimum social rules, such as a European minimum wage"
"The riches do not share naturally. It is normal for everyone to contribute to the common good according to his means »
"The big political struggles take time. It took decades to have social security. We will also get the wealth tax »
"We want a levy of 5,000 € / year for those who, in addition to their homes and professional assets, have € 1.25 million"
"We have to change paradigms. As J. Rifkin puts it: 'What allowed capitalism's unheard-of success will turn against it' "
"The right systematically invokes fatality. She tells us: 'we can not do otherwise', 'we have to be realistic' "
"In contrast to these fatalists is the PS. For the PS, to be realistic is to understand reality to better transform it "
"We can not continue like this. We need a refoundation of our social organization, our modes of production & management »
"Material progress is not enough. We must create new spaces for solidarity, exchange, sharing, in short, human relations "
"The gathering of progressives from all walks of life is a solution for the future"
"To the right that has the financial power, let's oppose a left that has the power of solidarity"
Greetings in Liège: find my complete speech http://t.co/ntLBzWyCGT

I learned - appalled and outraged - of the execution of the Brazilian Marco Archer in Indonesia today.
Without ignoring the gravity of the crimes that led to Archer's condemnation and respecting the sovereignty of Indonesia, I addressed a humanitarian appeal
I am deeply sorry that this last request has not found acceptance by the Indonesian Head of State
At this sad moment, my sorrow and comfort to the bereaved family. The Brazilian Ambassador in Jakarta is being called for consultations
RT @blogplanalto: Relations between the two countries were affected, said the president @dilmabr about execution of Brazilian in Indonesia: http: // ...
I feel so honoured to have friends like you who remembered my most special day. You made my birthday more special and memorable. Thank you!
@Son_of_Opolot no it certainly is not a bother. Unfortunately I will be out of town. So I will miss it.  I hope I will be luckier next time.
@Son_of_Opolot sorry I thought you meant January. But for February I hope I can make it then.

I said a short time ago, the Canadian foreign minister visits Israel: Israel's hands not be tied by the court in The Hague, fighting terrorism on every front and defend us against all threats
Today, along with my brother Mohammed bin Zayed and many other international leaders, I witnessed the opening of the World Future Energy Summit in Abu Dhabi http://t.co/JOvjDAkIey
Future Energy Summit is one of the main stations of the UAE in its endeavor to diversify its sources of energy and invest in the future clean and sustainable energy
The UAE is one of the countries most prepared for changes in international energy markets and changes in energy generation technology because energy security is a top economic priority
Israel will not have its hand tied by a politicized ICC. We will fight terrorism on every front and defend our people against any threat
